original_text: And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.
korean_text: 마리아가 이르되 주의 여종이오니 말씀대로 내게 이루어지이다 하매 천사가 떠나가니라

sentences.original_text: Behold the handmaid of the Lord
be it unto me according to thy word
And the angel departed from her
